Concentration

Maintaining focus on magical effects

Concentration Spells

Some spells require you to maintain concentration to keep their magic active. If you lose concentration, the spell ends.

Maintaining Concentration

  • You can concentrate on only one spell at a time
  • Casting another concentration spell ends the first
  • You must maintain concentration for the spell's duration

Breaking Concentration

You lose concentration if:

  • You cast another concentration spell
  • You take damage: Make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 10 or half the damage taken, whichever is higher)
  • You're incapacitated or killed
  • Environmental phenomenon: DM may require DC 10 Constitution save

Concentration Check

DC: 10 or half the damage taken (whichever is higher)

Roll: Constitution saving throw

Success: Maintain concentration

Failure: Spell ends
